prompt_text: Check the time. If it's between 6 AM and 9 AM, turn on the Office WLED to 50% with a warm white color. If it's between 5 PM and 8 PM, turn on all living room lights to 80% and set the Office WLED to 100% with a cool white color. If it's after 9 PM, only turn on the Office WLED to 20% brightness. Wait 5 seconds after any action, then turn off all other lights that weren't part of the selected time-based action.
automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_time_based_control'
alias: Office WLED Time-Based Control
description: "Time-based Office WLED brightness and color control with cleanup of other lights"
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: event
    event_type: office_wled_time_based_trigger
conditions: []
action:
  - choose:
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: "06:00:00"
            before: "09:00:00"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness: 128
              rgb_color:
                - 255
                - 160
                - 90
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: "17:00:00"
            before: "20:00:00"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness: 255
              rgb_color:
                - 180
                - 220
                - 255
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.living_room_2
            data:
              brightness: 204
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: "21:00:00"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness: 51
              rgb_color:
                - 255
                - 140
                - 60
  - delay: '00:00:05'
  - service: light.turn_off
    target:
      entity_id:
        - light.living_room_2
        - light.hue_go_1
        - light.hue_color_downlight_1_6
        - light.hue_color_downlight_2_2
        - light.hue_office_back_left
        - light.hue_color_downlight_1_7

questions.question_text: Which device did you mean? Device 'lights' matches devices in wrong location. You mentioned: living_room, living, office, selected time
Could you clarify: Action 'turn' is vague - missing details: dim, brighten
